author: uKuYu

changelog.release_notes: solving issues with date font size
Solving bugs with OG Pebble (blank line in bottom of screen)
Increase Datebox size and Font Size when Aspect ratio (zoom) greater then 95

Two new color Themes:
    - Happy July 4
    - Gray Scale
small bugfixing of color themes and shadows
bugfixing... screen savers doesn´t work as it must do
New config option to show battery with numbers inside a Box like Date one. Bug fixing when setting Back light on some situations.
Fixed bug with screen saver on,, second hand off, and own backligth time, backlight colud be always on...
Add the possibility of change backlight period when shaking your watch. This will drain your battery faster.
Bug fixing. Seconds for a while isn´t working correctly, this fix it, now only second hand appear when you shake your hand.
Solving Bug with Pebble 3.0 and function Pebble.getActiveWatchInfo(). Does´nt permit enter the configuration page ¡¡¡

Version 6.7 include better memory and battery managment.

Screen savers for PebbleTime (if the user wants, must select it on config page)

Fixed Bug to solve configuration on aplite. Now independant configurations for color and Black and White.

Added new color theme Platinum Edition.
Only fix a Problem when putting Shadows Off on PebbleTime

description:
WHO WANTS A ROUND WATCH HAVING A FABULOUS SQUARE ONE WITH A BIG ROUND INSIDE?

Highly configurable analog Clock with multiple configuration options. Made your own clock.

- Now you can change backlight period when shaking your watch. (bad for battery :D )

- Now with the possibility of adding Screen Saver (test it using the config page) to increase battery life. Put oils of Picasso, VanGogh, Modigliani, etc on your wrist !!!

- From Big to small clock sphere, chose the aspect ratio you want. 

- Shows day of week and Month in the local language (soon available for Pebble Time). 

- Shows battery through small squares or two chained squares when fully charged. 

- If Bluetooth detection is On, a small Circle over battery appears if you lost connection, you can choose also a double vibe in this case. 

- Lot of color Themes combinations and different Watch Hands for choose. 

- You can also configure, Show Shadows, Date Box, Bluetooth alert, Draw external circle, use or not Seconds hand, etc. 

+ If you see a Bug, please delete from locker and install last version, if it persist then send me an email. Any suggestion will be also welcome. 

+ Review an reinstall when new versions came up.

latest_release.release_notes: solving issues with date font size

title: Titan
